Title: Scruffs Trade Flex softshell XL Black
Description: Flexible, hardwearing and practical, this Scruffs Trade Flex soft shell jacket in XL is made of a high-tech 92% polyester fabric designed to stand up to challenging working conditions. Easy to wear all day long, this black jacket help you to look smartly professional in front of clients while keeping you warm, comfortable and dry whatever the work day throws at you.
category: Trade Essentials/PPE and Workwear/Jackets/Jackets.csv -> Scruffs Trade Flex softshell XL Black
Feature 1: Lightweight water-resistant softshell jacket provides protection from light rain
Feature 2: Slim fitting, with 4-way flex which allows maximum movement while working
Feature 3: Breathable mesh lining and high fleece-lined collar for warmth and protection against the elements
Feature 5: Features 3 x outer zipped pockets and an internal phone pocket for safe storage of valuables and tools

Title: Scruffs Trade Flex Softshell M Black
Description: Helping you to look good and stay comfortable on the job, this Scruffs Trade Flex soft shell jacket in black, size M, is made of a water-resistant fabric with a breathable mesh lining.
